datarefs.desc: Master Generator ALT ON or OFF
datarefs.comment: Master Generator ON or OFF: 0 = OFF, 1 = ON
Battery 1 ON or OFF: 0 = OFF, 1 = ON
Battery 2 ON or OFF: 0 = OFF, 1 = ON (standby battery C172)
Battery 2 Test ON or OFF: 0 = OFF, 1 = ON (standby battery C172)

Throttle #1 Ratio: 0.0 = Low Throttle, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1.0 = High Throttle
Throttle #2 Ratio: 0.0 = Low Throttle, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1.0 = High Throttle
Throttle Ratio All At Once_all: 0.0 = Low Throttle, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1.0 = High Throttle
Mixture #1 Ratio: 0.0 = Cutoff , 0.25, 0.5 = Lean, 0.75, 1.0 = Full Rich
Mixture #2 Ratio: 0.0 = Cutoff , 0.25, 0.5 = Lean, 0.75, 1.0 = Full Rich
Mixture Ratio All At Once: 0.0 = Cutoff , 0.25, 0.5 = Lean, 0.75, 1 = Full Rich
Propeller #1 Radians: 0.0 = 73.29, 0.25 = 125.64, 0.5 = 179, 1 = 282.70; When sim/cockpit2/engine/actuators/prop_mode = 0 (reverse); 1 (normal)
Propeller #2 Radians: 0.0 = 73.29, 0.25 = 125.64, 0.5 = 179, 1 = 282.70; When sim/cockpit2/engine/actuators/prop_mode = 0 (reverse); 1 (normal)
